RealMatrix

public RealMatrix(double[] x)
Creates a matrix from the given vector. The matrix will have dimension n*1 where element [i][0] will correspond with element x[i] of the vector

Parameters:
x - Vector used for creating a matrix from it

Returns the inverse of the matrix

Returns:
The inverse (null for now)

sum

public void sum(RealMatrix other)
Adds to the matrix the given matrix. The addition process is component by component x[i,j] = x[i,j] + other[i,j] for all i=1..n and j=1..m

Parameters:
other - The matrix to be added

substract

public void substract(RealMatrix other)
Substracts from the matrix the given matrix. The substraction process is component by component x[i,j] = x[i,j] - other[i,j] for all i=1..n and j=1..m

Parameters:
other - The matrix to be substracted

multiply

public void multiply(RealMatrix other)
Multiplies the matrix for the given matrix.

Parameters:
other - The matrix to multiply

transpose

public void transpose()
Transpose the matrix (rows becomes columns, columns become rows)

divide

public void divide(double x)
Divides each component of the matrix by the given value. x[i,j] = x[i,j] * x for all i=1..n and j=1..m

Parameters:
x - The division factor

elementsSquare

public void elementsSquare()
Raises each component of the matrix to the power 2.0 x[i,j] = x[i,j] ^ 2 for all i=1..n and j=1..m

elementsSqrt

public void elementsSqrt()
Sqrt-root each component of the matrix x[i,j] = x[i,j] ^ 1/2 for all i=1..n and j=1..m

rowSum

public double rowSum(int i)
Calculates the sum of the elements in the given row

Parameters:
i - The row index to be added
Returns:
The sum of the elements in the given row. Return 0 if the index is not valid

Calculates the sum of the elements in the matrix

diagonalSum

public double diagonalSum()
Calculates the sum of the elements in the principal diagonal, i.e. sum( x[i,i] ) for all i=1..n

Returns:
The sum of the elements in the principal diagonal

public double get(int i,
                  int j)
Returns the real at position i, j in the matrix

Parameters:
i - The row index
j - The column index
Returns:
The real value at position i,j if it is valid, 0.0 in other case

Determines if the matrix is squared or not

Returns:
true if the matrix is squared false otherwise

public double[] solve(double[] bB)
Solves the linear system Mx + B = 0 (If a solution is available)

Parameters:
bB - The vector of independent terms
Returns:
double[] of the variable values that satisfy the linear system, null if there is not solution
